page.title: 10LEISURE,BLACKHALL,EDINBURGH.
page.content: In Blackhall there are many{sporting {facilities}and{clubs}for people to join.Just off Craigcrook Road,hidden behind a row of terraced houses is the {bowling green}where many of the senior members of the community spend their time.Opposite we see the{tennis {club}with its three blaize courts and its club-house which has a small bar.Further on and up Ravelston Dykes we reach the picturesque{golf course also with its own bar and car park. Back on the main road we find the local{primary school}where many{sports {clubs}are held in the evenings, badminton,football and basketball are some of them which are enjoyed by all. {St. Columba's Church}also holds a variety of clubs.Many of the children in Blackhall go to{cubs,scouts,guides {and brownies}whilst others are often seen playing{football}in the park.
